column2: ISU, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This drug was not given a fair chance before it was pulled.  I was having good luck with no side effects.  In fact my mood was much better.

column2: shelton1, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Wish I could still buy this amazing drug.

column9: this treatment is awsome.  I love drugs.

column2: CLC, 45-54 on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I took this medication for 3 months and lost 80 lbs. I experienced absolutely no adverse side-effects either during or after its' use. It is a shame it was not studied in further detail before being yanked off of the market. If there was a legal way to get this pill again I would not think twice about it. I want it back!!

column2: cookie, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I also want this back. I lost 50 pounds and kept it off for ten years. Felt fine at the time and no heart problems now.

column2: bravesfan1331, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I want my Redux back. I lost approx 20 lbs before they took this off the market. I had all the tests and am fine. Taken alone it was a great medication. The FDA should re-evaluate when taken by itself.

column2: ggg, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
michelle garcia, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I was about 20 lbs. overweight and took redux for one month. I lost the weight I was trying to lose that would not come off with exercising in just one month. Stopped taking redux and was very happy with my weight loss results!

column2: ronaldg36, 25-34 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: This drug is very effective if used properly. I was on Redux only and was able to lose and maintain weight loss. It was the combination with Fen-Phen that caused the troubles.  This drug should be re-evaluated alone to judge effeciveness and likely of deadly side-effects.

There is a reason the FDA took this off the market so if there is anyone thinking of even trying to find it out of the country they're dumb. People died from this drug...I think that was a good enough reason to take if off the market.

column2: Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Not only did it curb my appetite but it totally eliminated my alcohol consumption. I kept my weight down about 5 years. I'd like to find it even if I have to go out of the country. To me it's worth the risk.
